name: Beacon of Light
description:
Beacon of Light is a game based around the idea of making failure actually useful for progression. 

Your goal is simple - complete the level as fast as you can.

While you make your way through the maze, evil forces lurk in the dark with only one desire - to find you. But don't worry, when you get caught by these creatures you leave a little beacon of light that will help you find your way through the dark.

Theme

Failure is progress. Mistakes made during the attempt to complete the level help the player by illuminating dark areas of the level.
